1.text: Incorporate fresh or frozen berries for a healthy burst of flavor.

2.text: Upgrade the batter with a handful of diced fruits for a fresh taste.

3.text: Toss a handful of dried fruit into the batter for a chewy texture.

4.text: Stir in banana or pumpkin purée to add flavor and density.

5.text: Update a plain muffin mix with lemon zest for a bright citrus flavor.

6.text: Add a spoonful of chopped nuts to the batter for a crunchy texture.

7.text: Stir in a spoonful of hemp seeds, flax meal, or chia seeds for a healthy option.

8.text: Incorporate toasted coconut for a rich, flavorful texture.

9.text: Add a handful chocolate chips for a gooey, decadent muffin.

10.text: Use coconut or almond milk instead of water for moist muffins.

11.text: Whip up a streusel topping to create a sweet, crunchy topping.

12.text: Upgrade any muffin recipe with cream cheese for a rich, decadent twist.

13.text: Add 1 teaspoon (4.9 ml) of vanilla extract to enhance the flavor.

14.text: Stir in cinnamon, nutmeg, or cocoa powder for rich, flavorful muffins.

15.text: Use brown sugar instead of white sugar for a sweeter, richer flavor.

16.text: Glaze the top of your muffins with cake frosting for an extra sweet treat.
